document_data.mainbody:
Roanoke was a patron of the Elfsong Tavern from the city of Baldurs Gate in the late 15 century DR.
In the , Roanoke was a customer of the Elfsong Tavern in the Eastway neighborhood of Baldurs Gate and one of the attendees of the "Laff Riot" show at the tavern. It was a stand-up comedy performance hosted by Harvard Willoughby in Elfsongs side room with a stage. Roanoke "almost pissed himself laughing" and recommended it to his friend, Phibs Brogan.
